recommendations.recommendation: Add schema markup to all pages
recommendations.reasoning: This technical improvement is crucial for www.cursor.com as a e-commerce website. Add schema markup to all pages will directly address technical issues that are impacting both search engine crawling and user experience. Implementing this change will improve search visibility and create a more stable foundation for your website.

recommendations.recommendation: Add alt text to all missing images
recommendations.reasoning: This technical improvement is crucial for www.cursor.com as a e-commerce website. Add alt text to all missing images will directly address technical issues that are impacting both search engine crawling and user experience. Implementing this change will improve search visibility and create a more stable foundation for your website.

recommendations.recommendation: Fix missing title tags and H1 headings
recommendations.reasoning: For www.cursor.com in the e-commerce industry, this on-page optimization is essential. Fix missing title tags and H1 headings will enhance your content's relevance and clarity for both users and search engines. This directly impacts how well your pages perform in search results for your target keywords.

For www.cursor.com in the e-commerce industry, this on-page optimization is essential. Improve meta descriptions will enhance your content's relevance and clarity for both users and search engines. This directly impacts how well your pages perform in search results for your target keywords.
The sitemap currently has 0 entries, rendering it ineffective for search engine crawlers.  A comprehensive sitemap is crucial for ensuring all important pages are indexed.

The provided internal linking sample is limited.  A robust internal linking structure is needed to improve site navigation and distribute link equity, boosting SEO and user experience.  Focus on linking relevant pages together, particularly from the homepage and high-authority pages.

The current URL structure shows inconsistencies (e.g., 'api/auth/login' vs. other simpler structures).  Implement a consistent and SEO-friendly URL structure using descriptive keywords and a logical hierarchy.  This improves crawlability and user understanding.

The 'blog' category has children, suggesting a need for better organization within the blog section.  Implement a clear blog category structure with relevant subcategories to improve navigation and content discoverability.

recommendations.recommendation: Assess and Improve API Documentation Architecture
recommendations.reasoning: The 'api' category suggests the presence of an API. Ensure the API documentation is well-structured, easily navigable, and accessible to developers. This is crucial for developer experience and adoption.
While no explicit mobile issues are mentioned, a comprehensive audit is necessary to ensure responsiveness across all devices and screen sizes.  This is crucial for user experience and SEO.

recommendations.recommendation: Implement a responsive design with viewport meta tag
recommendations.reasoning: Despite a high mobile optimization score, the lack of a viewport meta tag indicates potential inconsistencies across devices.  Adding this tag ensures proper scaling and rendering on all screen sizes, improving mobile usability and SEO.
Analyze text sizes, font weights, and spacing to ensure clear visual hierarchy.  Improve readability by increasing contrast between text and background, and using appropriate line heights.

recommendations.recommendation: Conduct user testing to identify pain points
recommendations.reasoning: Real user feedback is crucial for identifying usability issues not apparent through automated analysis.  Testing will reveal areas for improvement in navigation, information architecture, and overall user flow.
Strategically place CTAs throughout the site to guide users towards desired actions (e.g., signing up, requesting a demo).  Ensure CTAs are visually prominent and use clear, concise language.
Review the site's navigation structure to ensure it's intuitive and easy to use.  Improve information architecture by organizing content logically and making it easily discoverable.
